text:
The Algerian War, also known as the Algerian War of Independence or the Algerian Revolution ('; '; or ') was fought between France and the Algerian National Liberation Front (– FLN) from 1954 to 1962.
This war led to Algeria gaining its independence from France. Many saw it as a guerrilla warfare and was known for the use of torture. The war took place mainly on the territory of Algeria.
